      • Course

              Book b,
              int hp,
              java.lang.String q,
              java.lang.String[] a,
              java.lang.String correctAlt)
        Creates a new course.
        Parameters:
        n - The name of the course
        b - The book for the course
        hp - The course's credits
        q - A question to the course
        a - An array of answers to the question
        correctAlt - Specifies which of the answers that is correct

        public java.lang.Boolean courseQuestion(java.lang.String teacher,
                                        java.lang.Boolean hasBook)
        Ask a question to the avatar
        Parameters:
        teacher - The name of the teacher
        hasBook - A boolean that tells wether the avatar has the course's book or not.
        Returns:
